author: ekoneil
msg: BEEHIVE-435    	 ResultSetIterator isLast method throws exception on Derby

The problem here is that isLast can't be called with all ResultSet types.  Ironically, this is the same call that commons-dbutil uses, but I've switched off of it here and use "next" exclusively to determine if there's another row in the ResultSet.
